abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column; sellers of boxed wine are skipping the normal advertising methods and turning to word of mouth and taste tests.
snippet: Box wine sellers are skipping the normal advertising methods and turning to word of mouth and taste tests.
lead_paragraph: Box wine sellers are skipping the normal advertising methods and turning to word of mouth and taste tests.

headline.main: Putting Boxed Wine to the Taste Test

headline.seo: Boxed Wine Firms Claim They’ll Pass the Taste Test
